text: Pillars of the Republic is history book on the origins of the American common schools written by Carl Kaestle and published by Hill & Wang in 1983. == Further reading == * * * * * * * * Category:1983 non-fiction books Category:Hill & Wang books Category:American history books Category:English- language books Category:History books about education Category:History of education in the United States
title: Pillars of the Republic
